DOC.HEADLINE: REGIONAL ROUNDUP : NEXTEL OFFERS TO BUY AMERICAN MOBILE SHARES
DOC.TEXT: American Mobile Systems Inc. in Woodland Hills said Nextel Communications Inc. , a wireless communications company , has offered to purchase all_the American Mobile shares it doesn ' t already own for about $ 73 million . Nextel earlier agreed to acquire up_to 65 % of American Mobile equity for a combination of cash and properties in Florida.It currently owns about 9 % of American Mobile ' s shares . Under the new proposal , Rutherford , N.J.-based Nextel would issue 3 million of its common shares , currently valued at more_than $ 24 a share , in exchange for all_of American Mobile ' s outstanding shares . The acquisition of American Mobile is part of Nextel ' s plan to build a nationwide wireless communications_system . Its plans were dealt a setback last month when MCI Communications Corp . canceled a $ 1.3-billion marketing deal that would have linked its long-distance service with Nextel .
